LanguageData.Biodrone_Seeker.label: seeker
LanguageData.Biodrone_Seeker.description: Small, agile unarmed scout biodrone that deployed by the Federation. It's bioreactor is unstable and explodes upon destruction.

LanguageData.Biodrone_Seeker_Corpse.label: seeker corpse
